Description.Name: Contract for Brigand Airdrop
Description.Details: Due to your friendship with The Tortuga Dominions, they have offered you a contract with one of their mechwarriors. Purchasing this contract will permit a one-time airdrop of a Tortugan Brigand LDT-1 when using a BattleMech Airdrop Beacon. After use, the contract is void and the Brigand can no longer be called in. THIS IS A ONE-USE CONTRACT, IT WILL BECOME UNAVAILABLE AFTER USE! Hold Shift when deploying the airdrop ability to select a specific unit from among those available!
